document.full_text: an italian anarchist group has claimed responsibility for the parcel bomb which injured two people in the offices of the swiss nuclear lobby group on thursday, the swiss public prosecutor said friday.
document.title: anarchist group says behind swiss parcel bomb
lines_and_colors: an italian anarchist group has claimed responsibility for the parcel bomb which injured two people in the offices of the swiss nuclear lobby group on thursday, the swiss public prosecutor said friday.
